title: Venmegam Pennaaga Lyrics Yaaradi Nee Mohini
stanzas:
ven megam pennaaga uruvaanadho
en neram enaippaarththu vilaiyaadudho
unnaaley pala nyaabagam
en munney vandhaadudhe
en nenjam thindaadudhe

manjal veyil nee
minnal oli nee
unnai kandavarai kan kalanga
nirkavaikkum thee

penney ennadi unmai solladi
oru punnagaiyil pen iname
Kobappattadhennadi

dhevadhai vaazhvadhu
veedu illai kovil
kadavulin kaal thadam paarkkirean
ondraa irandaa un azhagai paada

kanmoodi oru oram naan saaigiren
kaaneeril aandham naan kaangiren

unnaaley pala nyaabagam
en munney vandhaadudhe
en nenjam thindaadudhe

endhan manasai kollaiyadiththaai
indha thandhiramum
mandhiramum engu sendru padithaai

vizhi asaivil valai viriththaai
unnai pallakkinil thookki
sella kattalaigal vidhiththaai

un viral pidikka
varam ondru kidaikka
uyirudan vaazhgiren naanadi
